metadata.synopsis: Generic tiefling hanging around camp after the party. Only shows up when a named tiefling is missing from the scene.

0.speaker: Kavil
0.text: Gods - this place is nice, but I can't wait to sleep under an actual roof again.
0.context: NodeContext: Slightly tipsy, enjoying selves at a party and happy to see you

1.speaker: Kavil
1.text: Grab a drink! I'm fairly certain it's all yours anyway.
1.context: NodeContext: Slightly tipsy, enjoying selves at a party and happy to see you
